resources.string: Click on the button below to download %1$s
Sorry, there are no options available at the moment, please try again later
Please, check WiFi or internet connection
Sorry, no such item was found, it may have been deleted, please try again later
Oops, something is wrong, we are already dealing with it
Download has been failed, please try again

How to install: 

 1. Download mod from the button above

 2. Open My File/File Manager/Zarchiver and go to the Download folder to find the zip pack you just download. Extract to /Archive name/

 3. put all .melmod file to Melon Playground go to the Android/data/com.studio27.MelonPlayground/files/Mods/

 4. put all .melsave file to Melon Playground go to the Android/data/com.studio27.MelonPlayground/files/Saves/

 5. After completing these operations, restart the game to use the mod you imported.

 6. You can also directly move the downloaded archive to the /Mods/ or /Saves/ folder depending on the files inside. And you can unpack it directly in the selected folder. For example, if all files in the archive are of the same type - only .melmod or only .melsave.

 7. Please see the detailed instructions with screenshots in the Info tab
